annotations.description: There wasn't a lot of action on the pitch. We could describe the game as average. You have to say that the visitors have been the better side. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession. The away side's tactic was counter attacking.

annotations.description: There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) missed a great opportunity! He finds himself some space near the penalty spot and plants a header goalwards which lacks both power and accuracy. The ball sails well over the bar!

Juventus enjoy a period of possession as they are exchanging some passes and waiting for an opportunity to strike.

Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) produces an effort from the edge of the box, but doesn't hit the ball properly and sends it yards wide of the left post.
Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.
Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort.

Jakub Blaszczykowski (Dortmund) fires a shot at goal from a very promising position outside the penalty area, but it is blocked by a self sacrificing defender. The ball goes out for a corner. Dortmund can continue in their attacking effort.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Roberto Pereyra displays great vision and sends a pass to Carlos Tevez (Juventus), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the back of the net. The score is 0:3.
Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) after a cross wins the header inside the box and steers it goalwards, but Gianluigi Buffon produces a wonderful reflex save.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Carlos Tevez feeds Alvaro Morata (Juventus), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 0:2.

Sokratis (Dortmund) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.

Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) produces a good strike that sails to the middle of the goal, but his effort ends up in the goalkeeper's gloves.
Good defending. Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) tries to find Kevin Kampl inside the box, but the pass is cut out.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Dortmund.
Juventus are enjoying a spell of pressure at the moment, but one of the defenders gets it clear. The ball is out of play. Juventus will take a throw in.
Roman Weidenfeller pulls off a great save to deny Alvaro Morata (Juventus), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom left corner.
Flag goes up against Mats Hummels (Dortmund) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.
A clumsy foul by Roberto Pereyra (Juventus) and Milorad Mazic blows his whistle.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) attempted to create a dangerous situation in front of goal by sending a cross into the box, but the defence easily dealt with the threat.
The linesman raises his flag for offside before Alvaro Morata (Juventus) heads on.

annotations.description: The resulting corner from Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack. The referee blows his whistle, Juventus are awarded a corner kick.
Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus) gets himself onto the end of the corner, but his header is blocked.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) will take the corner.

Alvaro Morata (Juventus) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the middle of the goal. Roman Weidenfeller guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save. Juventus get a corner.
Oliver Kirch (Dortmund) produces a lovely ball into the penalty area but the defender manages to intercept and comfortably averts the danger.

Juventus continue the game with a quickly taken free kick.
Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) fouls an opponent. At least that's what referee Milorad Mazic signals.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

We are watching a run of the mill game with only a few moments to ignite the crowd. The players surely can surely perform better, they just need to motivate themselves. The game is quite balanced. The home team are playing possession football, while the away team look to find a weakness in the opposition's defence mainly with their rapid counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Milorad Mazic has ended it.

Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) is obviously not following the Golden Rule: „Treat others as you want to be treated.“ He makes a bad challenge and leaves Milorad Mazic with no other option than to blow for a foul.

Decent spell from Dortmund here and they keep the pressure on until one of the defending players steps in.
